verbs.description: President Donald Trump ’s policies [V: have] separated more than 1,000 immigrant children from their parents at the border . But according to House Speaker Paul Ryan ( R - Wis . ) , it ’s not Trump ’s fault .

President Donald Trump ’s policies have separated more than 1,000 immigrant children from their parents at the border . But [V: according] to House Speaker Paul Ryan ( R - Wis . ) , it ’s not Trump ’s fault .
